author: ehu
msg: Merge r22554 into the ra_dav-refactoring branch.

author: ehu
msg: Allow creation of stand-alone parsers previously only provided
by svn_ra_dav__parsed_request().  Also integrate attaching the
first set of handlers with parser creation.
Note: We generally don't attach more than one set of handlers
to a request.  We can create an interface to attach more
old svn_ra_dav__xml_parser_create(). Move to start of the file.
(svn_ra_dav__xml_parser_create): Adjust based on the wrapper baton
(error_parser_create): Use xml_parser_create() now the public function

author: lgo
msg: Final fixes to make the path functions support Windows and UNC paths on

(get_path_ancestor_length): fix handling of UNC paths and some special
